PoliceStation.text: Sheriff Engle notes that you are carrying an awful lot of weapons. Either pay him $5 or discard all of your Weapons.

VelmasDiner.text: Velma reads the tea leaves left in your cup. Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass, the formation of the leaves indicates hope, you are Blessed. If you fail, the future looks bleak, you are Cursed.
